Cards have been sold

Looking for Check or Money Order. I'd like to avoid PAYPAL, but if you absolutely have to use it, please add the 3% to cover their fees.

Prices include first class shipping with delivery confirmation.

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card(s)

Email: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com
